sentences.translation: 君主拥有“权力”，而地方法官则拥有“帝国”。

sentences.sentence: Microsoft has gained imperium on OS market through its Windows products.
sentences.translation: 比尔·茨拥有视窗操作系统的专利权。

sentences.sentence: Par in parem imperium non habet " is an indisputable legal maxim in the world."
sentences.translation: 平等者之间无统治权，这是国际上不容争辩的一项法律格言。
